segments.text: I see the kitchen filled with a mix of warmth and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water running over the sink and pooling at the bottom makes me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing yet sad to see the woman so oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy’s determination to reach the cookie jar is commendable and a little reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a surge of anger; they know they’re sneaking cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how their actions create a perfect storm of chaos amidst her calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but it feels like a small part of me enjoys the rebelliousness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
